author: Alia Shoaib
title: Election-denying Trump loyalists are running for obscure offices to influence future elections in battleground states

sentence: Among those being subpoenaed are Kelli Ward, the Arizona GOP chair who has already filed suit to block the committee from getting her phone records, and Pennsylvania state Sen. Doug Mastriano, an outspoken purveyor of the false claim that there was widespread fraud in the presidential election.
title: New subpoenas from Jan. 6 committee target 'alternate elector' organizers

sentence: The committee also subpoenaed Pennsylvania gubernatorial candidate and state Sen. Doug Mastriano (R), Arizona GOP chairwoman Kelli Ward, former Michigan Republican State Committee chairwoman Laura Cox and Arizona state Rep. Mark Finchem (R), who is also a member of the far-right militia group the Oath Keepers.
author: Nicholas Reimann
title: Jan. 6 Committee Subpoenas Trump Campaign Officials Over Fake Electors Scheme

sentence: The latest bevy of subpoenas includes those sent to Pennsylvania state Sen. Doug Mastriano and Arizona state Rep. Mark Finchem, two Trump allies who the committee says boosted efforts to send alternate electors who would vote for Trump.
author: Virginia Aabram
title: 'False electors' targeted in new round of Jan. 6 committee subpoenas

sentence: Mark Finchem, an Arizona state House member, said in a press release the following week that he was there "to deliver an evidence book and letter to Vice President Pence showing key evidence of fraud in the Arizona Presidential Election, and asking him to consider postponing the award of electors" Doug Mastriano, a Pennsylvania state senator, publicly called for the Republican-controlled legislature in his state to appoint its own electors to change the outcome of the presidential election there because of "mounting evidence that the PA presidential election was compromised."
author: Zak Hudak
title: January 6 committee subpoenas others tied to false elector scheme

sentence: The subpoenas went to Arizona Republican Party Chairwoman Kelli Ward, a longtime Trump supporter, as well as Pennsylvania state Sen. Doug Mastriano, now running for governor there, and Arizona State House Rep. Mark Finchem, now running to be the next secretary of state in Arizona.
title: State officials pushing Trump alternate elector scheme come into focus

sentence: Recent polling shows State Senator Doug Mastriano, a retired Army colonel with a Ph.D. in history, leading the rest of the Republican candidates.
title: The Most Pivotal Elections in 2022 Are Not the Ones You Think

sentence: Leading GOP gubernatorial candidate Doug Mastriano, a state senator, has said he would appoint a secretary of state who would require all voters to re-register before casting their ballots, a move that could dramatically reshape the electorate and would likely violate federal law.
author: Rosalind S. Helderman
title: Leading GOP candidates in Pennsylvania were in Washington on Jan. 6
